entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
